resumes.role_title: Content Management & Design Systems Product Leader
resumes.role_summary: Product manager specializing in headless CMS, enterprise design systems, and structured content architecture for global, multi-brand ecosystems. I bridge UX, engineering, and content to build platforms where teams can design, ship, and evolve digital products with clarity and speed. My work centers on composable systems, multi-surface content delivery, and Al-supported workflows, helping organizations scale with reusable components, flexible schema design, and opinionated tooling. I thrive in ambiguous, systems-heavy environments where shaping foundational capabilities unlocks creativity across the entire product organization.
resumes.keywords_skills: headless CMS, enterprise design systems, structured content architecture, UX, engineering, content, composable systems, multi-surface content delivery, AI-supported workflows, reusable components, flexible schema design, opinionated tooling, foundational capabilities, product organization

experience.category_summary: Led the architecture and delivery of enterprise content and design foundations for a global portfolio of prestige beauty brands.

highlights.content: Led a two-year in-production innovation program that launched a luxury brand on a composable foundation, integrating a headless CMS, in-house commerce engine, and an enterprise design system (EDS) - validating the ecosystem later used to guide the enterprise migration to Shopify.
Product Lead for EDS, serving 20+ brands across 75+ markets; built theming, governance, workflows, and a multi-brand component model designed for consistency without sacrificing expression.
Integrated EDS and CMS architecture, defining shared content models, component mappings, and API-driven delivery layers to ensure design-content parity across web, mobile, and emerging surfaces.
Developed extensible content schemas (microcopy, metadata, taxonomy) that support personalization, guided shopping, and future Al/GenAl workflows.
Improved editorial velocity by rethinking authoring, preview, and publishing workflows, dramatically reducing time-to-publish compared to the legacy CMS.
Led the Headless CMS RFP, evaluating platforms across localization, extensibility, UX, and performance with engineering, architects, and brand teams.
Partnered with engineering on a Shopify migration proof of concept, demonstrating how EDS tokens and components accelerate multi-brand rollout.

experience.category_summary: Owned CMS modernization, structured content strategy, and platform integrations for a high-volume global retail ecosystem.

highlights.content: Quarterly Simplification Award Winner (Jan 2023) for building a Contentful migration utility that automated 500+ page transfers and saved hundreds of production/engineering hours.
Led the shift from a monolithic stack to a composable MACH architecture, integrating Contentful (CMS), AEM Assets (DAM), and Riversand (PIM).
Implemented a new taxonomy system in the PIM to improve product discoverability and support richer faceted search and filtering experiences.
Designed and executed a strategy for structured content modeling that enabled dynamic content reuse across the website and mobile app, significantly improving SEO signal and user engagement.
Partnered with SEO and Engineering leads to implement a robust technical SEO roadmap, including automated schema markup, optimized URL structures, and improved core web vitals.

experience.category_summary: Product Lead for FX Networks website redesign nominated for Webby Award 2023 (sizzle reel).

highlights.content: Led the product strategy for the redesign of the FX Networks website, delivering a site optimized for both user engagement and search visibility.
Defined technical requirements for the new CMS to support modular design and ensure content was structured for SEO best practices.
Conducted comprehensive audits of accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA) and SEO performance, driving remediation efforts with engineering and design teams.
Facilitated weekly reviews with stakeholders to align on product vision, ensuring the final deliverable met high standards for performance and usability.
Defined the MVP for a headless CMS implementation (Drupal 8) with an API-first architecture, improving content flexibility and delivery speed.
Led the RFP process for CMS vendor selection, evaluating platforms based on scalability, API capabilities, and ease of use.
Mapped end-to-end customer journeys to inform the design of a new content ecosystem and CMS implementation.
Led the company-wide rollout of Drupal 8, streamlining content management and improving site performance.
Managed the implementation of an enterprise DAM system (Celum) and established governance for digital asset lifecycles.
Optimized digital workflows to increase team productivity by 40%, improving time-to-market for digital campaigns.
Managed digital systems for 30+ global brands, ensuring compliance with regional regulations and data governance standards.
Led global engineering and design teams to deliver scalable digital solutions that reduced operational risk.

resumes.role_title: Design Systems & Content Management Product Leader
resumes.role_summary: Seasoned Product Leader with expertise in headless CMS, PIM, DAM, and design system implementation for enterprise e-commerce ecosystems. Proven track record of driving digital transformation, enhancing content operations, and delivering exceptional user experiences through systems thinking, cross-functional collaboration, and strategic vision.
resumes.keywords_skills: headless CMS, PIM, DAM, design system implementation, digital transformation, content operations, user experiences, systems thinking, cross-functional collaboration, strategic vision

experience.category_summary: Led the architecture and delivery of enterprise content and design foundations for a global portfolio of prestige beauty brands.

highlights.content: Product Lead for the Enterprise Design System (EDS) serving 20+ prestige beauty brands across 75+ markets and 30+ languages, establishing clear roles, agile workflows, and scalable collaboration models to govern a universal component and pattern library, while enabling brand expression via themes.
Enabled brand expression through token-driven theming while maintaining consistency, accessibility, and governance across shared UI components.

Partnered closely with engineering on a Shopify proof of concept (POC) and made the business case to leadership that the Enterprise Design System (EDS) was the strategic enabler for scaling brand migrations-demonstrating how EDS components and tokens could deliver governance, reusability, and creative flexibility across 20+ global brands.
Architected the integration between the Enterprise Design System and Content Management Systems (CMS) to streamline content creation and ensure brand consistency across digital touchpoints.
Directed the Headless CMS RFP process, evaluating platforms for scalability, API capabilities, and ease of integration with existing tech stacks.
Developed comprehensive documentation and training materials for the design system and CMS to facilitate adoption and ensure best practices across global teams.

experience.category_summary: Owned CMS modernization, structured content strategy, and platform integrations for a high-volume global retail ecosystem.

highlights.content: Led the transition from a monolithic architecture to a composable MACH (Microservices, API-first, Cloud-native, Headless) stack, integrating Contentful (CMS), AEM Assets (DAM), and Riversand (PIM).
Spearheaded the Headless CMS RFP process, aligning engineering, UX, editorial, and merchandising teams on requirements and platform selection.
Designed and implemented modular content models to enhance reusability and ensure consistent content delivery across web, mobile app, and in-store digital displays.
Established catalog structures and merchandising taxonomies to improve product attribution, search relevance, and data integrity.
Orchestrated the integration of PIM data with search, recommendation engines, and personalization platforms via robust APIs to drive customer engagement.
Advocated for content-as-code principles and atomic content modeling to prepare the organization for advanced AI-driven content automation initiatives.

Recognized with a Quarterly Simplification Award (Jan 2023) for developing a Contentful migration utility that automated the transfer of over 500 pages, saving hundreds of hours in manual production and engineering effort.

experience.category_summary: Product Lead for FX Networks website redesign nominated for Webby Award 2023 (sizzle reel).

highlights.content: Served as Product Lead for the FX Networks website redesign, a project nominated for a 2023 Webby Award.
Gathered and synthesized stakeholder requirements to define actionable features for the CMS replatforming and site redesign.
Collaborated with creative teams to ensure the modular design strategy aligned with CMS capabilities and constraints.
Facilitated weekly design reviews to verify adherence to SEO best practices, WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards, and technical requirements.
Led the CMS RFP process and defined the MVP for a headless CMS implementation (Drupal 8) utilizing modular, API-first content delivery.
Oversaw the product roadmap and managed iterative releases, coordinating efforts across engineering and design teams to meet project milestones.
Developed comprehensive customer journey maps to guide CMS selection and the design of the content ecosystem.
Directed the company-wide implementation of a new CMS (Drupal 8), ensuring alignment with business goals and user needs.
Enhanced project delivery and team productivity by 40% through strategic workflow optimization and process improvements.
Managed the implementation of an enterprise Digital Asset Management (DAM) system (Celum), establishing lifecycle governance policies.
Oversaw digital systems for over 30 brands, leading global design and engineering teams to deliver high-quality digital solutions.
Established governance controls that significantly reduced legal and operational risks across the organization's digital portfolio.

skills.content: Content Management Systems (CMS), Headless CMS, Content Architect, Content Modeler, Metadata & Taxonomy, Structured Content, Schema.org, Content Modeling, Product Information Management, PXM, Digital Asset Management, DAM, Contentful, WordPress, Drupal, Storyblok, Adobe Experience Manager (AEM). Shopify, Celum, Widen, AEM Assets
